backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, sessions, calls, scheduled sessions, and authorization-protected operations with timers and state maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new structure by initializing scheduled sessions and new session ID counter.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature implementations, associated files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, color variables, light/dark themes, and global utility layers.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes with TanStack Router, wraps app with theme provider, and integrates auth-protected pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Renders login/logout UI using Internet Identity and user profile data with dropdown actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard that redirects unauthenticated users to login and shows a loading screen during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Ensures the user has a profile, redirecting to signup if missing and showing a loading state during fetch.
frontend/src/components/feedback/StarRat: Interactive star rating component with hover and click support, allowing optional read-only mode and size variants.
App layout wrapper providing background styling, navbar, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying brand info, contact link, social icons, and a dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with links, theme toggle, auth buttons, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/liveclass/JoinLi: Generates and displays a sharable join link with copy-to-clipboard support for calls or sessions.
frontend/src/components/liveclass/VideoC: Manages WebRTC video call UI and lifecycle, handling offers, answers, ICE candidates, and stream setup.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: Displays a grid of marketing feature cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Shows a three-step explanation of how the platform works using icon cards.
Card showing a match's skills, rating, credit cost, and a button to book a session.
frontend/src/components/sessions/BookSes: Provides a dialog for booking a scheduled session, validating date/time, and submitting a create-session mutation.
frontend/src/components/sessions/CreateS: Dialog to create a new scheduled session with optional title, skill selection, and time inputs, then submit via mutation.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Shows a generated session join link with copy-to-clipboard support after session creation.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Light/dark theme toggle button using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallSignaling.ts: Hooks for initiating, answering, and managing WebRTC signaling calls via backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, and logout via AuthClient with context-based access.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, scheduled sessions, feedback, and session creation/joining via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionsLocal.ts: Manages user-specific localStorage sessions, allowing loading, adding, and removing session entries keyed by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTimer.ts: Simple timer hook tracking elapsed seconds with start, stop, and reset controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRTCPeer.ts: Implements a WebRTC peer connection hook handling media initialization, offer/answer creation, ICE candidates, stream updates, and connection state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility classes for gradients, cards, and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user profile, credits, upcoming sessions, and allows creating or joining scheduled sessions with validation and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero content, features, testimonials, and navigation actions for learning or teaching.
frontend/src/pages/LiveClassPage.tsx: Handles the live class experience including call initiation, signaling, timers, scheduled session logic, and post-session feedback.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login UI and redirects authenticated users to a target page or the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SignupProfilePage.tsx: React page for collecting user name and skills, handling skill add/remove, and submitting profile creation before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SkillMatchPage.tsx: Skill matching page with search, category filters, mock match data, and session booking flow requiring login.
frontend/src/utils/creditCalculation.ts: Provides a simple deterministic credit calculation based on session duration and rating.
Utility functions for converting nanosecond timestamps, formatting session times, validating join windows, and checking future dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project version, scope, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the Skill Sync platform.
